text: Hello guys, in my workflow I install gsap via yarn, and it is pretty okay to use it in global js file. I am wondering, can I use gsap in modules, and how?

It throws the error when I try to add the import statement at the very beginning of the module js file:
```import gsap from "gsap";```
Without the import, the async function would also return error that gsap is not defined.
And your global.js file is indeed called on the page?
Yes, it has been included into the base layout template file of the theme via `require_js` right before `standard_footer_includes`.
you can decrease the 1000ms timeout to something less drastic like 100
Okay, cool! Thank you, I will test this out later, and let you know if it works. Appreciate your help a lot! :star:
